task.title: Alive Day 1 Quest
task.body: Over the next few hours, do something that will make you feel more connected to another person (e.g. by listening to them)?

sharingWall.question: How did today’s quest make you feel?
sharingWall.exampleText: It made me feel connected to both myself and others

followUp.title: Alive Day 1 Check-in
followUp.body: Time to check-in with today’s quest!

task.title: Uppdrag dag 1
task.body: Under de kommande timmarna, vad skulle du kunna göra för att känna samhörighet med en annan person (till exempel genom att lyssna på dem)?

sharingWall.question: Hur kände det att göra dagens uppdrag?
sharingWall.exampleText: Det fick mig att känna mig närvarande.

followUp.title: Uppdrag dag 1 Check-in
followUp.body: Dags att checka in med dagens uppdrag!

task.title: Desafio ALIVE dia 1
task.body: Durante as próximas horas, faz uma coisa que te deixe mais conectada/o com outra pessoa (por exemplo, ouve essa pessoa com toda a atenção).

sharingWall.question: O que te fez sentir o desafio de hoje?
sharingWall.exampleText: Fez-me sentir conectada/o comigo e com os outros

followUp.title: Check-in Dia 1 Alive
followUp.body: Está na altura de fazeres *check-in* no desafio de hoje!
